title: Lucky Defense Tier List
description: Discover the top mythic heroes in Lucky Defense, ranked from S to C Tier, to optimize your gameplay strategy.

introText: Discover the top mythic heroes in Lucky Defense, ranked from S to C Tier, to optimize your gameplay strategy.

data.itemDescription: Indy boasts incredible versatility, able to function effectively across various scenarios. His ability to generate resources quickly is a game-changer, allowing for sustained gameplay even when dealing with high-pressure levels
Bat Man is an outstanding damage dealer, capable of inflicting significant damage with minimal investment. His skills scale efficiently, making him an essential unit for many builds
King Dian is a powerhouse, recognized for dealing high damage at crucial points in the game. His synergy with certain characters, like Frog, enhances gameplay versatility and effectiveness
Lancelotâ€™s scaling damage makes him an exceptional character, especially in Hard mode. As he reaches level 12, the damage output becomes formidable, creating a valuable asset for players
The Kitty Mage offers rapid cooldown reduction, enhancing overall team performance. She is particularly valuable early in the game, enabling players to accelerate their strategies
Bomba is effective due to her area-of-effect attacks, which can clear waves of enemies efficiently. Her explosive damage makes her a primary choice in many setups
The Dragon provides a solid mid-game presence, with powerful attacks that can devastate opponents and control the battlefield
Coldy excels in defense and crowd control, making him ideal for protecting the backline. Players appreciate his durability and support capabilities
Frig Prince stands out for his ability to freeze opponents, creating tactical advantages by controlling the battlefield
Blod is a solid damage dealer with decent survivability, helping teams maintain pressure during encounters
Vayne provides excellent versatility and strong on-demand damage, making her a reliable choice for most builds
Watt can offer consistent utility through energy generation, which amplifies the functionality of other units
Iron Meow is a unique character that provides strategic flexibility, adept in both defense and offense when leveled appropriately
Mana provides essential resource management tools, allowing players to sustain their builds throughout the game
Monopody Man can generate stone, offering critical mid-game resources. His def reduction buffs other attackers like Bat Man effectively
